arabicText: فَلَمَّا كَشَفْنَا عَنْهُمُ ٱلْعَذَابَ إِذَا هُمْ يَنكُثُونَ
englishTranslationText:
So	when	We	averted	the	calamity	from	
them,	they	immediately	broke	the	
promise!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Phir	jab	Ham	ne	un	se	woh	musibat	tāl	di	
jabhi	woh	'ahad	tod	gaye

arabicText: وَنَادَىٰ فِرْعَوْنُ فِى قَوْمِهِۦ قَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ أَلَيْسَ لِى مُلْكُ مِصْرَ وَهَـٰذِهِ ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِىٓ ۖ أَفَلَا تُبْصِرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	said	Firaun,	“O	my	people!	Is	not	the	
kingdom	of	Egypt	for	me,	and	these	rivers	
that	flow	beneath	me?	So	do	you	not	see?”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Fir'aun	apni	qaum	meiñ	pukārā	ke	aey	
meri	qaum	Kiyā	mere	liye	Misr	ki	salṭanat	
nahiñ	aur	yeh	nahreñ	ke	mere	neeche	
behti	haiñ	to	kiyā	tum	dekhte	nahiñ

arabicText: أَمْ أَنَا۠ خَيْرٌۭ مِّنْ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى هُوَ مَهِينٌۭ وَلَا يَكَادُ يُبِينُ
englishTranslationText:
“Or	that	I	am	better	than	him,	for	he	is	
lowly	-	and	he	does	not	seem	to	talk	
plainly.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Yā	maiñ	behtar	hooñ	us	se	ke	ƶalil	hai	aur	
bāt	sāf	karnā	m'alom	nahiñ	hotā

arabicText: فَلَوْلَآ أُلْقِىَ عَلَيْهِ أَسْوِرَةٌۭ مِّن ذَهَبٍ أَوْ جَآءَ مَعَهُ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ مُقْتَرِنِينَ
englishTranslationText:
“So	why	was	he	not	bestowed	with	armlets	
of	gold?	Or	angels	should	have	come	with	
him	staying	at	his	side!”
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	is	par	kiyuñ	na	dāle	gaye	sone	ke	
kangan	yā	us	ke	sāth	farishte	āate	ke	us	ke	
pās	rahte

arabicText: فَٱسْتَخَفَّ قَوْمَهُۥ فَأَطَاعُوهُ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ قَوْمًۭا فَـٰسِقِينَ
englishTranslationText:
So	when	he	had	brainwashed	his	people,	
they	followed	him;	indeed	they	were	a	
disobedient	nation.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Phir	us	ne	apni	qaum	ko	kam	'aql	kar	diyā	
to	woh	us	ke	kahne	par	chale	be-shak	woh	
be	ḥukm	log	they.

arabicText: فَلَمَّآ ءَاسَفُونَا ٱنتَقَمْنَا مِنْهُمْ فَأَغْرَقْنَـٰهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
englishTranslationText:
So	when	they	made	Us	wrathful,	We	took	
revenge	from	them	-	We	therefore	drowned	all	of	them.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Phir	jab	unhoñ	ne	woh	kiyā	jis	par	Hamārā	
ghazab	un	par	āayā	ham	ne	un	se	badla	liyā	
to	Ham	ne	un	sab	ko	dubo	diyā.

englishTranslationText: So	We	made	them	a	bygone	fable	and	a	lesson	for	the	latter	generations.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Unheñ	Ham	ne	kar	diyā	agli	dāstān	aur	
kahāwat	pichloñ	ke	liye

arabicText: ۞ وَلَمَّا ضُرِبَ ٱبْنُ مَرْيَمَ مَثَلًا إِذَا قَوْمُكَ مِنْهُ يَصِدُّونَ
englishTranslationText: And	when	the	example	of	the	son	of	Maryam	is	given,	your	people	laugh	at	it!
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	jab	Ibn-e-Maryam	ki	misāl	bayān	ki	jāye	jabhi	tumhāri	qaum	us	se	hansne	lagte	haiñ
